医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现低升糖指数和高升糖指数饮食比低碳水化合物饮食更能提高耐力表现发表在《运动医学 – 开放》上的一项研究评估了碳水化合物摄入量和血糖指数如何影响耐力训练结果，显示对代谢灵活性和糖原储存的显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Study-finds-low-and-high-GI-diets-boost-endurance-performance-over-low-carb-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Study-finds-low-and-high-GI-diets-boost-endurance-performance-over-low-carb-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b67a566-eb1a-4a53-a358-ae08132d083b Tue, 16 Apr 2024 19:09:00 -0400 Study finds low and high GI diets boost endurance performance over low-carb diets
用益生菌和合生元治疗糖尿病《临床营养学》的系统综述分析了随机试验，以评估益生元和合生元对糖尿病血糖控制的影响，揭示了空腹血糖、血清胰岛素和 HbA1C 水平的显着益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Managing-diabetes-with-probiotics-and-synbiotics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Managing-diabetes-with-probiotics-and-synbiotics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e98cf21-6f55-4fbd-8507-69398df1ee32 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 18:57:00 -0400 Managing diabetes with probiotics and synbiotics
青少年的垃圾食品饮食可能会长期扰乱大脑的记忆能力南加州大学领导的一项新研究提出了一种可能性，即青少年吃垃圾食品可能会长期破坏他们大脑的记忆能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Junk-food-filled-diet-in-teens-may-disrupt-brains-memory-ability-for-a-long-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Junk-food-filled-diet-in-teens-may-disrupt-brains-memory-ability-for-a-long-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2470fc40-bcba-42e5-843c-7fac88d51410 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 16:19:59 -0400 Junk food-filled diet in teens may disrupt brains' memory ability for a long time
探索基因变异如何影响严重癫痫儿童的脑细胞癫痫是一种导致反复发作的脑部疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Exploring-how-gene-variants-affect-brain-cells-in-children-with-severe-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Exploring-how-gene-variants-affect-brain-cells-in-children-with-severe-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0c0af6c-98c6-40b0-84d1-b36580e7c0df Tue, 16 Apr 2024 16:14:11 -0400 Exploring how gene variants affect brain cells in children with severe epilepsy
FDA 宣布召回与死亡和受伤有关的心脏泵FDA 周一宣布，一对与数百人受伤和至少 14 人死亡有关的心脏装置已收到 FDA 最严重的召回。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/FDA-announces-recall-of-heart-pumps-linked-to-deaths-and-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/FDA-announces-recall-of-heart-pumps-linked-to-deaths-and-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3b1c5f7-b0b9-406d-84f5-5c9cb38beb50 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 16:09:53 -0400 FDA announces recall of heart pumps linked to deaths and injuries
研究揭示了促进癌细胞有效摄取 ASO 的新方法反义寡核苷酸 (ASO) 是下一代药物，可以通过阻止基因中有害信息的传递来治疗疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Study-reveals-novel-approach-to-promote-efficient-uptake-of-ASOs-into-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Study-reveals-novel-approach-to-promote-efficient-uptake-of-ASOs-into-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77f08a22-f700-4beb-aef5-7c11875ecf1b Tue, 16 Apr 2024 13:18:41 -0400 Study reveals novel approach to promote efficient uptake of ASOs into cancer cells
需要采取紧急行动解决健康问题社会决定因素，创造更健康的未来专家认为，我们必须针对健康的社会决定因素（人们出生、成长、生活、工作和年龄的条件）采取行动，并将可持续性置于 NHS 未来的核心，以确保一个健康、繁荣和更有弹性的社会。英国医学杂志 (BMJ) 委员会关于 NHS 未来的两份新报告中提到。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Urgent-action-needed-to-tackle-social-determinants-of-health-for-a-healthier-future.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Urgent-action-needed-to-tackle-social-determinants-of-health-for-a-healthier-future.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0618d9bb-98c9-48c6-88be-2d182cffcbb9 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 08:06:00 -0400 Urgent action needed to tackle social determinants of health for a healthier future
创新的测试方案减少了 IBD 诊断的漫长等待时间一项新的研究发现，疑似炎症性肠病（IBD）患者可以受益于更好的检测方案，从而减少可能不必要的结肠镜检查的需要和漫长的等待时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Innovative-testing-protocol-reduces-the-lengthy-wait-for-IBD-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Innovative-testing-protocol-reduces-the-lengthy-wait-for-IBD-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d96c5a53-2914-4165-aac6-4de503b16c77 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 07:57:55 -0400 Innovative testing protocol reduces the lengthy wait for IBD diagnosis
新柳叶刀乳腺癌委员会：改变全球乳腺癌护理新成立的《柳叶刀》乳腺癌委员会今天发布了有关改善全球乳腺癌护理的调查结果和建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/New-Lancet-Commission-on-Breast-Cancer-Transforming-breast-cancer-care-globally.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/New-Lancet-Commission-on-Breast-Cancer-Transforming-breast-cancer-care-globally.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f8a89cf-7150-411b-9ceb-670be8b6846a Tue, 16 Apr 2024 07:53:08 -0400 New Lancet Commission on Breast Cancer: Transforming breast cancer care globally
诉讼指控奥巴马医改计划转换计划针对低收入消费者周五提起的一项范围广泛的诉讼概述了一项赚钱计划，大型保险销售机构呼叫中心通过该计划将人们纳入平价医疗法案计划或改变他们的承保范围，所有这些都未经他们的许可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Lawsuit-alleges-Obamacare-plan-switching-scheme-targeted-low-venue-consumers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240416/Lawsuit-alleges-Obamacare-plan-switching-scheme-targeted-low-venue-consumers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8c31e59-bbd3-46af-983a-ae26af7419d1 Tue, 16 Apr 2024 07:02:54 -0400 Lawsuit alleges Obamacare plan-switching scheme targeted low-income consumers
